name: sizeresize
description: A group of helper functions that allow you to run various functions at different screen sizes when resize has ended.

scripts.build:js: cp _build/_js/index.js index.js && browserify _build/_js/script.js -d -o sizeresize.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:js:prod: cp _build/_js/index.js index.js && browserify _build/_js/script.js -o sizeresize.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]

author: Dan Blake <dan@designbyblake.com> (http://www.designbyblake.com)
